services.name: Mini Facial
services.description: A quick refresh for your skin. Perfect for busy schedules or first-time facial experiences.

services.name: Basic & Back Facials (Women)
services.description: Complete facial treatment including back care. Deep cleansing, exfoliation, and hydration.

services.name: Basic Back Facials (Men)
services.description: Tailored facial treatment for men. Addressing specific skincare needs with professional care.

services.name: Acne Facial (Grade 1 & 2)
services.description: Targeted treatment for acne-prone skin. Helps clear breakouts and prevent future blemishes.

services.name: Full Lavish Hydrating Glow Facial (Women / Non-Bearded Men)
services.description: Our signature treatment. Ultimate hydration and luminous glow for radiant, youthful skin.

services.name: Men's Custom Bearded "Dapper than Ever" Facial
services.description: Specialized facial for bearded gentlemen. Skin and beard care combined for the perfect look.

services.name: Microdermabrasion Facial
services.description: Advanced exfoliation treatment for smoother, brighter skin. Reduces fine lines and improves texture.

services.name: Microneedling
services.description: Collagen-boosting treatment for skin rejuvenation. Minimizes scars, wrinkles, and large pores.

services.name: Underarm Waxing
services.description: Quick and efficient underarm hair removal for smooth, confident arms.

services.name: Chin Waxing
services.description: Precise hair removal for a smooth, defined chin area.

services.name: Brow Waxing
services.description: Expert shaping for perfectly defined eyebrows.

services.name: Brow Lamination & Waxing
services.description: Lamination for fuller brows combined with expert waxing for perfect shape.

services.name: Full Arm Wax
services.description: Complete arm hair removal from shoulder to wrist.

services.name: Leg Waxing
services.description: Smooth, silky legs with long-lasting results.

services.name: Brow Wax w/Tint
services.description: Shape and enhance your brows with expert waxing and professional tinting.

services.name: Brow Lamination / Tint / Wax
services.description: The complete brow transformation. Lamination, tinting, and precise waxing.

services.name: Brow Lamination
services.description: Transform unruly brows into sleek, defined arches that last for weeks.

services.name: Brow Tint ONLY

services.name: Brow Lamination & Tint
